divs: sighting details1) in a small low elevation area near the entrance to red rock canyon and i was taking a photo of the cactus like plant in the shot. 2) never saw it. only noticed something got in my shot when looking at the small lcd screen on the back of the nikon d70 i was using and i thought the shot was ruined. i got my first real look at it once i got back home a few days later. 3) i honestly didn't think it was what i thought. some say bug, but the white poofy smoke thing still makes me think. 4) looks like a silver metallic object with smoke exhaust going from left to right. 5) n\a due to never seeing it in the 1st place. 6) same as above, never knew it was there. feedback is always appreciated.
Object Shape: Blimp, Bullet, Missile, Cigar, Disc, Oval
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around March 15th 2005
This sighting has never been favorited.
